required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Follow up Study of Patients Treated With Imlifidase Prior to Kidney Transplantation
clinical_study.official_title: A Prospective Observational, Long Term Follow up Study of Patients Treated With Imlifidase Prior to Kidney Transplantation

brief_summary.textblock:
The rationale for the current protocol is to collect data from extended follow up in subjects that have received a kidney transplant following imlifidase dosing to provide a better understanding regarding the long-term outcome for these subjects. Data of parameters such as patient and graft survival, comorbidity, treatment of graft rejection episodes and quality of life as well as anti-drug antibody levels will be collected.
This prospective, observational follow up study of subjects who have received imlifidase prior to kidney transplantation will provide important data to future prescribers and patients of the potential long-term benefits of imlifidase mediated transplantation.

primary_outcome.measure: Evaluation of graft survival in subjects who have undergone kidney transplantation after imlifidase administration.
primary_outcome.time_frame: 5 years after first dose of imlifidase
primary_outcome.description: The primary endpoint of this study is to determine overall graft survival, defined as time from transplantation to graft loss.

secondary_outcome.measure: Evaluation of long-term clinical outcomes of transplanted subjects treated with imlifidase in terms of patient survival.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 5 years after first dose of imlifidase
secondary_outcome.description: Overall patient survival defined as time from transplantation to death for any cause

secondary_outcome.measure: Evaluation of long-term clinical outcomes of transplanted subjects treated with imlifidase in terms of kidney function (eGFR).
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 5 years after first dose of imlifidase
secondary_outcome.description: Kidney function as evaluated by eGFR

secondary_outcome.measure: Evaluation of long-term clinical outcomes of transplanted subjects treated with imlifidase in terms of kidney function (P-creatinine).
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 5 years after first dose of imlifidase
secondary_outcome.description: Kidney function as evaluated by P-creatinine

secondary_outcome.measure: Evaluation of long-term clinical outcomes of transplanted subjects treated with imlifidase in terms of kidney function (proteinuria).
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 5 years after first dose of imlifidase
secondary_outcome.description: Kidney function as evaluated by proteinuria

secondary_outcome.measure: Evaluation of long-term clinical outcomes of transplanted subjects treated with imlifidase in terms of number of graft rejection episodes.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 5 years after first dose of imlifidase
secondary_outcome.description: Record graft rejection episodes (classified by Banff, Haas et al 2018)

secondary_outcome.measure: Evaluation of long-term clinical outcomes of transplanted subjects treated with imlifidase in terms of treatment of graft rejection episodes.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 5 years after first dose of imlifidase

secondary_outcome.measure: Evaluation of long-term clinical outcomes of transplanted subjects treated with imlifidase in terms of comorbidities.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 5 years after first dose of imlifidase

secondary_outcome.measure: Evaluation of long-term clinical outcomes of transplanted subjects treated with imlifidase in terms of treatments of comorbidities.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 5 years after first dose of imlifidase

secondary_outcome.measure: Assessment of safety laboratory testing in terms of hematology (Hb)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 5 years after first dose of imlifidase
secondary_outcome.description: Blood samples will be analysed for hemoglobulin (Hb)

secondary_outcome.measure: Assessment of safety laboratory testing in terms of hematology (differential analysis of leucocytes)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 5 years after first dose of imlifidase
secondary_outcome.description: Differential analysis of leucocytes will be done in blood samples

secondary_outcome.measure: Assessment of safety laboratory testing in terms of hematology (thrombocytes)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 5 years after first dose of imlifidase
secondary_outcome.description: Blood samples will be analysed for thrombocytes

secondary_outcome.measure: Assessment of safety laboratory testing in terms of total IgG
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 5 years after first dose of imlifidase
secondary_outcome.description: Blood samples will be analysed for total IgG levels.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: 5 years after first dose of imlifidase
secondary_outcome.description: DSA levels in blood samples will be analysed by SAB-HLA

secondary_outcome.measure: Assessment of the presence of BK virus
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 5 years after first dose of imlifidase
secondary_outcome.description: Blood samples will be analysed for antibodies towards BK virus

secondary_outcome.measure: Assessment of the immunogenicity of imlifidase
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 5 years after first dose of imlifidase
secondary_outcome.description: Serum samples will be analysed for anti-drug antibody (ADA) levels using an ImmunoCAP assay.

secondary_outcome.measure: Evaluation of long-term clinical outcomes of transplanted subjects treated with imlifidase in terms of quality of life (EQ-5D-5L).
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 5 years after first dose of imlifidase
secondary_outcome.description: Health related quality of life (HR-QoL) as evaluated by patient questionnaires EQ-5D-5L

secondary_outcome.measure: Evaluation of long-term clinical outcomes of transplanted subjects treated with imlifidase in terms of quality of life (KDQOL-SF).
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 5 years after first dose of imlifidase
secondary_outcome.description: Health related quality of life (HR-QoL) as evaluated by patient questionnaires KDQOL-SF

intervention.description: This is a five year, long-term follow up, observational study. The study will primarily determine the time of graft survival in subjects who have received imlifidase prior to kidney transplantation. Subjects who have participated, or are currently participating, in the imlifidase kidney transplantation studies (called feeder studies) 13-HMedIdeS-02, 13-HMedIdeS-03, 14-HMedIdeS- 04 and 15-HMedIdeS-06 will be included. The subjects will attend 4 follow up visits, 1, 2, 3 and 5 years after imlifidase administration.

biospec_descr.textblock: Blood samples (storage time: maximum 2 years after completion of the study report according to local regulations)

study_pop.textblock: Subjects that have participated, or are currently participating, in the imlifidase kidney transplantation studies; 13-HMedIdeS-02, 13-HMedIdeS-03, 14-HMedIdeS-04 and 15-HMedIdeS-06 will be included.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Signed Informed Consent obtained before any study-related procedures
- Previous dosing with imlifidase followed by kidney transplantation and participation in one of the following clinical studies: 13-HMedIdeS-02, 13-HMedIdeS-03, 14-HMedIdeS-04 or 15-HMedIdeS-06
Exclusion Criteria:
- Individuals deemed unable to comply with the protocol
- Inability by the judgment of the investigator to participate in the study for other reasons

facility.name: New York University School of Medicine
